General.Name: Suzhou New Sea Union Telecom Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: New Sea Union Technology Group Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of communication products, IDC data products, and lithium battery materials. It offers new energy, new energy LED, 4G communication, and FTTx communication and products, as well as new energy vehicles; and software, and video and Internet services. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Suzhou, China.

0.Name: Mr. Yibin  Zhang
0.Title: Chairman, Pres & Sec. to the Board
